sentences.en: A logarithm tells you what power a base number must be raised to in order to produce a given value.
sentences.cn: 对数说明一个底数的几次幂等于一个给定的值。

sentences.en: Based on the discrete logarithm, this paper proposes a group signature schemes.
sentences.cn: 基于离散对数给出了一种组签字方案.

sentences.en: Here , another scheme based on elliptic curve discrete logarithm problem ( ECDLP ) was proposed.
sentences.cn: 传统的代理签名方案都是基于 离散对数问题 的.

sentences.en: His first designs were for a machine to calculate such things as logarithm tables.
sentences.cn: 他的最初设计是为机器计算诸如对数表之类的事情.

sentences.en: In cryptography, we also need to discuss modular logarithm.
sentences.cn: 在密码学中, 我们也需要讨论模对数.

sentences.en: It is firstly def ined as minus logarithm PH indicator.
sentences.cn: 首先定义为氢离子浓度负对数.

sentences.en: It is repressed as the logarithm of the opacity of the material.
sentences.cn: 在印刷方面,‘学密度’通常简称为‘度’.

sentences.en: Now the commonly used seal groove is a logarithm spiral groove.
sentences.cn: 现在的密封槽型比较常用的是对数螺线槽.

sentences.en: PH value: Self defines the negative logarithm being hydrogen ion concentration.
sentences.cn: PH值: 本身定义是氢离子浓度的负对数.

sentences.en: Returns the logarithm of a specified number in a specified base.
sentences.cn: 返回指定数字在使用指定底时的对数.

sentences.en: The characteristic of the logarithm 6.3214 is 6.
The decimal part of a logarithm. In logarithm 2.95424, the mantissa is 0.95424.
sentences.cn: 尾数对数的小数部分.如在对数2. 95424中, 尾数是0.95424.

sentences.en: The decimal part of a logarithm. In the logarithm 2.95424, the mantissa is 0.95424.
sentences.cn: 尾数对数的小数部分. 如在对数2.95424中, 尾数是0.

sentences.en: The fifth day is the logarithm stage for the mycelium growth.
sentences.cn: 菌丝体生长的第五天为菌丝对数生长阶段.

sentences.en: The natural logarithm of this ratio is called the logarithmic decrement.
sentences.cn: 此比率自然对数称为对数的减量.

sentences.en: The whole - number part of a logarithm is called the characteristic.
sentences.cn: 对数的整数部分叫做“首数”.

sentences.en: This led him to calculate that the information content of any event was proportional to the logarithm of its inverse probability of occurrence.
sentences.cn: 这使他提出了这样的推论：事件的信息容量与事件发生逆概率的对数成正比。

sentences.en: This plots the logarithm to base 10 of the values on the axis.
sentences.cn: 此命令在轴上绘制以 10 为底的值的对数。

trans.tran_en: a number representing another number in a mathematical system so that complicated calculations can be done as simple addition
